Words of Wrath

Prerequisite: Bard, training in Intimidate, words of friendship power
Benefit: You gain a +2 feat bonus to Intimidate checks.
    Also, when you use words of friendship, you can choose for the power bonus to apply to the next Intimidate check you make before the end of your next turn, instead of the next Diplomacy check.

Published in Dragon Magazine 396.
